pr_title: [JBPM-9492] Send signals using alias without need to send the instanceid

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9492] Send signals using alias without need to send the instanceid

Retrieving containerId using KieServerRegistry just for the API
mentioned in the JIRA

timeline.body:
full qualified package name can be move to the imports section.
```suggestion
            assertEquals(STATE_COMPLETED, pi.getState().intValue());
```

full qualified package name can be move to the imports section.

assertEquals(STATE_COMPLETED, pi.getState().intValue());
